pageProps.title: The Role of AI (Artificial Intelligence) in Unity Game Development
pageProps.metaDesc: Unity game development has come a long way since its inception in 2005. With advancements in technology, the scope of game development has expanded exponentially, and one of the key driving forces behind this evolution has been the rise of artificial intelligence (AI) in game development. AI is now an essential tool for game developers, providing them with the ability to create immersive and engaging games that can adapt to player behavior and provide a more personalized gaming experience.
